author: coherent911

text:
@JimDrizzle So some quick research shows that DQ was in fact Dragon Warrior in America until 2005. I also read this interesting little quote: "Dragon Warrior has been credited with establishing the basic template for all other RPGs." That's pretty incredible IMO. 

Dragon Warrior was, interestingly enough, my first RPG as a kid. I had no idea what I was doing when I played it. I just searched the first town for a while, got scared when a slime killed me, then went back to Mario Bros. Lol.
author: JimDrizzle

text: What's the deal with Dragon Quest and Dragon Warrior. I was told Dragon Warrior 1-4 were part of the same series. I had no idea there was a Dragon Quest 2. Plus this song sounds so similar to songs from Dragon Warrior. Time to do some research!
author: JimDrizzle

author: guitarskills2

text: @drunyon214 That's in America; songs like Overture 1812 are copyrighted to the country of origin for eternity.
author: guitarskills2

text:
Thanks very much Supra for introducing me to Mr.Sugiyama's music, I haven't heard any DQ music before I subscribed to your channel and I'm very happy I did =).

I've been listening to more of his pieces and he definitely has inspirations from Bach and Handel. I was just saddened when I looked up his personal life I read he's a extreme nationalist.  He even denies the Nanking massacre...sad when  such talented people are blind in other things.
author: SkepticalFox

text: Copyrights only last for the author's life plus 70 years... so if you wanted to, you should be okay to use any classical music made before the past century or so.

author: SupraDarky

text:
Sugiyama definitely took some inspiration from Bach's Air for this one, which must be why I've always been a fan of this theme (well, of DQ music in general).

So I'll make some people relieved and others disappointed, but yesterday's upload was indeed fake. Even if I wanted to continue a list of﻿ classical music, I'm afraid I'd get hit by waaaay too many copyright problems, which is something I'd rather avoid. I thought saying the list was ranked would obviously show it was an April Fools. :P
author: SupraDarky
